formElement.label: Application name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the website to add the application, i.e: 'Default Web Site'. (Required)

formElement.label: Virtual path:
formElement.documentation: Virtual path of the application, i.e: '/myApplication'. (Required)

formElement.label: Absolute physical path:
formElement.documentation: The absolute physical path of the application to create, i.e: 'c:/Inetpub/wwwroot/myApp'. (Required)
